title: Did Riot just Update?
body: I was in champion select for my ranked game for my 3rd promo and it booted me out right before the enemy team picked their champions and it was about to be my turn and when i tried to sign back in League was updating. I have a high end rig that has never done that. But because of it i got booted from the game and stopped my promotion WTF? Is there anything i can do about this? Or was it not updating? WTH?
